[[Solar TV|Solar TV 10]] (2009-2011)| transmitter_power = ''5 KW''| homepage = [http://www.etc.com.ph/ www.etc.com.ph]| }} '''DWKI-TV''', channel 10, is a relay television station of [[Radio Philippines Network]].
